title: Learning ADC in preparation of Season 8

body:
Hi all,

Thanks for taking you're time, in reading this little blog of mine.

I'm currently Silver 3, with a MMR on OP.GG of Silver 1, which is cool. I'm finding myself, that playing adc, is basically a 1 v 2  match up, for the most part. Which kind of is disappointing, in some cases (Being mid Silver)

Anyways I've picked up a few champions, in the role of adc, and i'm looking at improving my own skills, when it becomes a one sided game.

Trist / Kog / Twitch / Jhin / Varus / Sivir / Cait & Lucian

In addition, I actually want to learn Kalista, but I feel she isn't in a good spot currently.

A few things I have issues with.

Positioning in lane, is probably my main issue...
Managing the waves per cs.
I sit around 60 - 80 per 10 minutes, which I think is okay, but can be improved obviously.

Personal note: I'm looking for coaching, free or will pay either or should be awesome.

Thank you for reading.
